title: Dyson Ball Maneuverability  - Official Dyson Video
description: The only vacuum that rides on a ball.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
The only vacuum that rides on a ball. 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: I love the ball, the Dyson is fantastic. Regular vacuums have straight wheels so they only move in one direction. The ball can move any direction with a flick of your wrist. You can like vacuum to the left real easily or to the right real easily without torquing your wrist. It just makes things much easier to to maneuver around furniture and get into the places that we typically couldn't get in. You go places where the other vacuums would have to back and forth, back and forth, and not with the Dyson vacuum at home. It is my absolute go to before I grab a dusting rag I grab my Dyson. Not that cleaning your house is fun, but it's a lot more fun with the Dyson ball.
